{{Wireless embedded system |brand=DrayTek |model=Vigor 2710 |revision=ne |asin=B004FVDWQE;DE; |is_manuf=Yes |availability=now |fcc_date=06/03/2010 |fcc_id=VGYV2710NE |type=wireless router, dsl modem, |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Lantiq <!-- Infineon --> |cpu1_model=PSB 50601;AMAZON-SE, (PSB 50601 HL V1.2); |cpu1_cspeed=266 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L3206EM2I-12G |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM639165TS-7G |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3070L |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Infineon |sw_model=ADM6996M |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |flags=ADSL2+ |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=DrayTek |default_ssid_regex=^DrayTek$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin }} {{TagLine|ADSL2/2+ Modem Router with 802.11n WLAN}} :[https://www.draytek.com.au/products/xdsl-routers/vigor2710e-series/vigor2710ne/ Product page] (AU) {{â€¢}} [http://www.draytek.com/user/PdInfoDetail.php?Id=119#PdQuLinkInfo User's guide]
This FCC ID may apply to the.. *Vigor 2710e *Vigor 2711ue *Vigor 2712ne *Vigor 2712e *Vigor 2712ue
This device may use the AMAZON-SE-lite. Assumed single-stream device.. :Per the manual, the default SSID is ''DrayTek''.
